title: Marketo Web URL
description: Use for information regarding web details events such as interaction, page details, and referrer.

marketo:URL.title: URL
marketo:URL.description: The normative or usual URL of the web page.  This may or may not be the actual URL used to reach the page, which would be recorded using `Web Link`.
